name: boxer
content:
boxer noun [C]
(SPORTSPERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who takes part in the sport of boxing: He was a heavyweight boxer before he became an actor.
Sayan Puangkham/EyeEm/GettyImages

boxer noun [C]
(DOG)
a dog of medium size with short, light brown hair and a short, flat nose
